description: This source file implements a calculator's core logic, including tokenization, conversion to Reverse Polish Notation, evaluation, and input sanitization. It facilitates safe expression parsing and computation without using eval, and exposes public functions for external use.

methods.name: tokenize(expression)
methods.description: Tokenizes an input string into numbers, operators, and parentheses, supporting unary minus.

methods.name: toRPN(tokens)
methods.description: Converts a list of tokens into Reverse Polish Notation using the Shunting-Yard algorithm.

methods.name: evalRPN(rpn)
methods.description: Evaluates an RPN token list to produce a numeric result.

methods.name: evaluateExpression(expr)
methods.description: Safely evaluates an arithmetic expression string, combining tokenization, RPN conversion, and evaluation.

methods.name: formatResult(n)
methods.description: Formats numeric results to avoid floating point artifacts and long tails.

methods.name: sanitizeInputSequence(current, nextChar)
methods.description: Sanitizes input sequences to prevent invalid states like multiple decimals or consecutive operators.

ctags.pattern: /^  '*': { precedence: 2, assoc: 'L', fn: (a, b) => a * b },$/
/^  '+': { precedence: 1, assoc: 'L', fn: (a, b) => a + b },$/
/^  '-': { precedence: 1, assoc: 'L', fn: (a, b) => a - b },$/
/^  '\/': { precedence: 2, assoc: 'L', fn: (a, b) => {$/
